title: Withdraw
subtitle: Request a withdrawal to your wallet

amount.label: Withdrawal Amount
amount.canWithdrawUpTo: You can withdraw up to ${{amount}} USDC
amount.needMinimum: You need at least ${{amount}} to make a withdrawal
amount.insufficientMinimum: Insufficient balance. You need at least ${{amount}} to withdraw.

modal.title: Rank Downgrade Warning
modal.rankChange: Your rank will change from {{from}} to {{to}}

longTermImpact.title: Long-Term Impact
longTermImpact.monthlyLoss: You will stop earning per month
longTermImpact.annualLoss: You will stop earning per year
longTermImpact.warning: This is the money you will STOP RECEIVING if you proceed with this withdrawal!

inactivationWarning.title: Account May Be Inactivated
inactivationWarning.description: Your balance will fall below $100, which may result in account inactivation. You will lose all daily yield benefits.

modal.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to proceed with this withdrawal? This action cannot be undone.

warnings.downrankDescription: After this withdrawal, your balance will be ${{newBalance}}, which is below the minimum required (${{minimum}}) for your current rank. This may cause a rank downgrade.
warnings.downrankMessage: Your balance after withdrawal (${{balance}}) will be below the minimum (${{minimum}}) for your rank.

processing.title: Processing Time
processing.description: Withdrawals are processed within 72 hours. You'll receive your funds at the specified address.

success.title: Request Submitted
success.message: Your withdrawal request has been submitted successfully. Your funds will be sent within 72 hours.

errors.title: Error
errors.message: Failed to submit withdrawal request. Please try again.
